field.label: Domain
field.help: Select a domain to route via SNI on Layer4.

field.label: Matchers
field.help: Match the traffic of the selected domain via one of the offered protocols. When the protocol matches, the traffic will be routed (proxied) to the chosen upstream domain. All unmatched traffic will be routed to the HTTP reverse proxy.

field.label: Upstream Domain
field.help: Enter a domain name or IP address of the upstream destination. If multiple are chosen, they will be load balanced with the default random policy.

field.label: Upstream Port
field.help: Leave empty to use the default port or choose a custom port for the upstream destination.

field.label: Description
field.help: Enter a description for this Layer4 route.
